snippet: A British police unit says it is closing an investigation into the hacking of climate scientists' e-mail because it cannot identify the culprit
abstract: A British police unit says it is closing an investigation into the hacking of climate scientists' e-mail because it cannot identify the culprit

headline.main: Hacking Inquiry Closes With Mystery Unsolved
